head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EVANS, JANE PRESTON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EVANS, JANE PRESTON

block.p: EVANS-Jane Preston. May 21, 2000. Wife of the late Robert Beverley Evans. Mother of Jane Evans Jones of Middleburg, Va. and Robert Beverley Evans, Jr. Sister of Mary Bilwock of Winter Park, Fla. Also survived by four grandchildren. Memorial Service Tuesday, May 23, at Christ Church, Grosse Pointe, at 11AM. Memorial tributes may be sent to Christ Church, Grosse Pointe, 61 Grosse Pointe Boulevard, Grosse Pointe Farms, Michigan 48236 or to the Michigan Psychoanalytic Institute, 32841 Middlebelt Road, Farmington Hills, Michigan 48334.
